page.title: 11BROADFORD YOUTH HOSTEL
page.content: {Broadford Youth Hostel}situated in Corry can accommodate up to 78 people with places for 36 males and 42 females.There are two permanent staff with one extra taken on for the busiest part of the season in July and August.The busiest part of the year extends from June through to September with the bulk of the visitors coming from Germany,England,Scotland, Australia,Canada,the U.S.A. and France. Most visitors stay an average of two nights but stays vary from overnight to three days or more. With increasing numbers of{hikers}and hillwalkers and campers passing through Broadford it is necessary to build an extension on to the existing building and this is due to begin in November.
